_header: And our Lord went out of the temple in hidels alone
_description: A fragment from the South English Legendary — ten lines

CULAdd4544.First Lines:
…And our lord wente out of þe temple in hudels aloneGo
                    vle þe dey þo þe giwes him heneden mid stoneHoliere þen
                    our lord sulf ne wilne nouȝt to beÞer wre as he þe send word
                    henne þou most vle…
CULAdd4544.Last Lines:
…And in his feble bodi maden mani a strong woundeTo prison hi
                    him beren aȝe þo he ne miȝte him sulf nouȝt
                    go…
CULAdd4544.Note:
Fragment: part of single leaf, five lines on recto, five on
                    verso.
